Card Title
Rawang, Selangor

16

July

Details...

<!-- Simple card example -->
<div class="card">
    <div class="card-image">
        <img src="colors.jpg"> class="img-responsive">
    </div>
    <div class="card-header">
        <div class="card-title h5">Put your title here</div>
        <div class="card-subtitle text-gray">This is subtitle</div>
    </div>
    <div class="card-body">
        Insert your content here
    </div>
    <div class="card-footer">
        <button class="btn btn-primary">Button</button>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="btn btn-link">Link Button</div>
<div class="btn btn-primary">Primary Button</div>

<div class="btn btn-error">Error Button</div>
<div class="btn btn-primary btn-block">Block Button</div>

Breadcrumb

Breadcrumb example

  • Home
  • About 
<!-- Breadcrumb example -->
<ul class="breadcrumb">
    <li class="breadcrumb-item">
        <a href="#">Home</a>
    </li>
    <li class="breadcrumb-item">
        <a href="#">About</a>
    </li>
</ul>

</div>

</div>

Pagination

Pagination example

  • Previous
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • ...
  • 12
  • Next 
<!-- Pagination example -->
<ul class="pagination">
    <li class="page-item disabled">
        <a href="#" tabindex="-1">Previous</a>
    </li>
    <li class="page-item active">
        <a href="#">1</a>
    </li>
    <li class="page-item">
        <a href="#">2</a>
    </li>
    <li class="page-item">
        <a href="#">3</a>
    </li>
    <li class="page-item">
        <span>...</span>
    </li>
    <li class="page-item">
        <a href="#">12</a>
    </li>
    <li class="page-item">
        <a href="#">Next</a>
    </li>
</ul>

Panels

Panels example

Comments
<!-- Panels example -->
<div class="panel">
    <div class="panel-header">
        <div class="panel-title">Comments</div>
    </div>
    <div class="panel-nav">
	<!-- navigation components: tabs, breadcrumbs or pagination -->
    </div>
    <div class="panel-body">
	<!-- contents -->
    </div>
    <div class="panel-footer"
        <div class="input-group">
            <input type="text" class="form-input" placeholder="">
            <button class="btn btn-primary input-group-btn">Send</button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Popovers

Popovers example

This top popover
This is right popover 
<!-- Popovers example -->
<div class="popover popover-right">
    <button class="btn btn-primary">right popover</button>
    <div class="popover-container">
        <div class="card">
            <div class="card-header"></div>
            <div class="card-body text-center">
                This is right popover
            </div>
            <div class="card-header"></div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<!-- Steps example -->
<ul class="step">
    <li class="step-item">
        <a href="#" class="tooltip" data-tooltip="Step 1">Step 1</a>
    </li>
    <li class="step-item active">
        <a href="#" class="tooltip" data-tooltip="Step 2">Step 2</a>
    </li>
    <li class="step-item">
        <a href="#" class="tooltip" data-tooltip="Step 3">Step 3</a>
    </li>
    <li class="step-item">
        <a href="#" class="tooltip" data-tooltip="Step 4">Step 4</a>
    </li>
</ul>

Tiles

Tiles example

One Punch Man

World's Strongest Hero seeks any enemies to challenge him who were too strong for any hero or enemy to defeat...

<!-- Tiles example -->
<div class="tile">
    <div class="tile-icon">
        <div class="example-tile-icon">
            <i class="icon icon-file centered"></i>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="tile-content">
        <p class="tile-title">Title</p>
        <p class="tile-subtitle text-gray">Subtitle</p>
    </div>
    <div class="tile-action"></div>
</div>

Navbar

Navbar example

ZCSS
Home Component Layout 
<!-- Navbar example -->
<header class="navbar">
    <section class="navbar-section">
        <a href="#" class="navbar-brand mr-2">ZCSS</a>
    </section>
    <section class="navbar-center">
	<!-- centered logo or brand -->
    </section>
    <section class="navbar-section">
        <div class="input-group input-inline">
            <a href="#" class="btn btn-link">Home</a>
            <a href="#" class="btn btn-link">Component</a>
            <a href="#" class="btn btn-link">Layout</a>
        </div>
    </section>
</header>

col-xs-6
col-xs-3
col-xs-3
<!-- Responsive example -->
<div class="container">
    <div class="columns">
        <div class="column col-xs-6">col-xs-6</div>
        <div class="column col-xs-3">col-xs-3</div>
        <div class="column col-xs-3">col-xs-3</div>
    </div>
</div>

Modals

Modals example

Modal title
Content here 
<!-- Modals example -->
<div class="modal active" id="modal-id">
    <a href="#close" class="modal-overlay" aria-label="Close"></a>
    <div class="modal-container">
        <div class="modal-header">
            <a href="#close" class="btn btn-clear float-right" aria-label="Close"></a>
            <div class="modal-title h5">Modal title</div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-body">
            <div class="content">
                Content here
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="modal-footer">
            <button class="btn btn-primary">Close</button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
